message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to let it go for $12,000.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I'm interested, but that price is a little high for me. Could you do $9,000?
I understand you're looking to save some money, Bob. I can do $11,000, but that's as low as I can go. It's still a great deal for you!
I appreciate you working with me, Alice.  How about we split the difference and do $10,000?
I like your thinking, Bob, but I was thinking more along the lines of $11,500. That way, I can still make a decent profit and you'll still get a great deal.
Alice, I'm getting close to my limit.  $10,200 is the best I can do.
I can see you're really interested in the product, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $10,000 and $10,200, so I'll do $10,100. That's the best I can do.
